# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import os;
from chemdistiller.utils.periodictable import parse_formula, formula_to_element_vector;
from chemdistiller.utils.base64 import decode_from_base64;
import numpy as np;



[docs]def parse_string_fragments(s):
    s=s.split(',');
    return [float(i) for i in s];

    

[docs]def parse_string_fragment_charges(s):
    lst=[];
    inbracket=0;
    ss='';
    for i in s:
        if i=='[':
            inbracket=1;
            ss='';
        elif i==']':
            inbracket=0;
            lst.append([float(i) for i in ss.split(',')]);
            ss='';
        elif inbracket==1:
            ss+=i;
    return lst;




[docs]class DBase:

    def __init__(self,database_path):
        self.database_path=database_path;
        self.db_name='';
        self.db_fullname='';        
        self.db_description='';
        self.db_license='';
        self.db_source_url='';
        self.db_citation='';
        self.db_version='';
        self.db_format=0;
        self.db_subgroupindex=0;
        self.db_groupname='';
        self.db_index=0;
        self.currentfile='';
        self._initialize_database();
        #self.close=self._defclose();
        

[docs]    def close(self):
        return 0;

        
    def _initialize_database(self):
        #print(os.path.join(self.database_path,'dbinfo.dat'));
        if os.path.isfile(os.path.join(self.database_path,'dbinfo.dat')):
            #print('found');
            with open(os.path.join(self.database_path,'dbinfo.dat'),'r') as f:
                for s in f:
                    s=s.replace('\n','');
                    #print(s);
                    if   s.upper().startswith('DBNAME'):
                        self.db_name=s.split('=',1)[1];
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBFULLNAME'):
                        self.db_fullname=s.split('=',1)[1];
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBDESCRIPTION'):
                        self.db_description=s.split('=',1)[1];
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBLICENSE'):
                        self.db_license=s.split('=',1)[1];
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBSOURCEURL'):
                        self.db_source_url=s.split('=',1)[1];
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBCITATION'):
                        self.db_citation=s.split('=',1)[1];
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBVERSION'):
                        self.db_version=s.split('=',1)[1];
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBFORMAT'):
                        self.db_format=int(s.split('=',1)[1]);
                        #print(self.db_format);
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBSUBGROUPINDEX'):
                        self.db_subgroupindex=int(s.split('=',1)[1]);
                    elif s.upper().startswith('DBGROUPNAME'):
                        self.db_groupname=s.split('=',1)[1];
        if self.db_format==1:
            self._init_raw();
        elif self.db_format==2:
            self._init_binary();
        elif self.db_format==3:
            self._init_hdf5();
        else:
            print('Format unsupported!');

        
    def __enter__(self):
        return self;

    def __exit__(self, exc_type, exc_value, traceback):
        self.close();
        
    def _close_raw(self):
        if hasattr(self,'datafile'):
            if not self.datafile.closed:
                self.datafile.close();

        
    
    def _close_binary(self):
        print('Closed binary');
    
    def _close_hdf5(self):
        print('Closed hdf5');
        
    def _init_raw(self):
        self.retrieve_records=self._raw_retrieve_records;
        self._next_record=self._raw_next_record;
        self.close=self._close_raw;
        self.fpt_mask=np.full((11416//8,1),255,np.uint8);
        

    def _init_binary(self):    
        self.retrieve_records=self._binary_retrieve_records;
        self._next_record=self._binary_next_record;
        self.close=self._close_binary;
        self.fpt_mask=np.full((11416//8,1),255,np.uint8);
        #Read FPT mask here
        
    def _init_hdf5(self):        
        self.retrieve_records=self._hdf5_retrieve_records;
        self._next_record=self._hdf5_next_record;
        self.close=self._close_hdf5;
        self.fpt_mask=np.full((11416//8,1),255,np.uint8);
        #Read FPT mask here


    def _raw_record_accepted(self,record):
        mz=record['MZ'];
        #print(mz);
        if mz<self.mzmin:
            return False;
        if mz>self.mzmax:
            raise StopIteration();
        if self.charged:
            if abs(self.charge-record['Charge'])>1e-8:
                return False;
        for f in self.filters:
            if f.rejected(record):
                return False;
        return True;
        
    def _get_next_raw_record(self):
        #print(self.currentfile);
        if self.currentfile=='':
            self.currentfile=os.path.join(self.database_path,self.subf,
                                          str(self.mzcurrent//1000),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%1000//100),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%100//10),
                                          '%s.st2'%str(self.mzcurrent%10));
            while (not os.path.isfile(self.currentfile)) and (self.mzcurrent<=self.mzmax_int):
                self.mzcurrent+=1;
                self.currentfile=os.path.join(self.database_path,self.subf,
                                          str(self.mzcurrent//1000),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%1000//100),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%100//10),
                                          '%s.st2'%str(self.mzcurrent%10));
            if self.mzcurrent<=self.mzmax_int:
                self.datafile=open(self.currentfile,'r');
            else:
                raise StopIteration();                
        
        s=self.datafile.readline();
        while s=='':
            self.datafile.close();
            self.mzcurrent+=1;
            self.currentfile=os.path.join(self.database_path,self.subf,
                                          str(self.mzcurrent//1000),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%1000//100),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%100//10),
                                          '%s.st2'%str(self.mzcurrent%10));
            while (not os.path.isfile(self.currentfile)) and (self.mzcurrent<=self.mzmax_int):
                self.mzcurrent+=1;
                self.currentfile=os.path.join(self.database_path,self.subf,
                                          str(self.mzcurrent//1000),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%1000//100),
                                          str(self.mzcurrent%100//10),
                                          '%s.st2'%str(self.mzcurrent%10));
            if self.mzcurrent<=self.mzmax_int:
                self.datafile=open(self.currentfile,'r');
            else:
                raise StopIteration();                
            s=self.datafile.readline();
            
        s=s.replace('\n','').split('\t');
        record={};
        record['MZ']=float(s[0]);
        if self.charged:
            record['Mass']=float(s[1]);
            record['Charge']=float(s[2]);
        record['ShortInChi']=s[1+self.offs];
        record['InChi']=s[2+self.offs];
        record['SMILES']=s[3+self.offs];
        record['IDs']=s[4+self.offs];
        if 'FPT' in self.required_fields:
            record['FPT']=decode_from_base64(s[5+self.offs]);
            # Mask FPT here !
        if 'Frag' in self.required_fields:
            record['Frag']=s[6+self.offs];
            if self.charged:
                record['FragCharge']=s[9];
        #print(self.required_fields);
        if 'Formula' in self.required_fields:
            record['Formula']=parse_formula(s[1+self.offs].split('/')[0]);
            if 'ElementVector' in self.required_fields:
                record['ElementVector']=formula_to_element_vector(record['Formula']);
        else:
            if 'ElementVector' in self.required_fields:
                record['ElementVector']=formula_to_element_vector(parse_formula(s[1+self.offs].split('/')[0]));
            
        return record;
        
        
    def _raw_next_record(self):
        record=self._get_next_raw_record();
        #print('%s %s %s %s'%(self.mzmin,self.mzmax,record['MZ'],self._raw_record_accepted(record)))
        while not self._raw_record_accepted(record):
            record=self._get_next_raw_record();
        if 'Frag' in self.required_fields:
            record['Frag']=parse_string_fragments(record['Frag']);
            if self.charged:
                record['FragCharge']=parse_string_fragment_charges(record['FragCharge']);
        record['Scores']={};
        for scorer in self.scorers:
            scorer.process_molecular_candidate_record(self,record);
        #print('returning');
        return record;
        
    def _binary_next_record(self):
        raise StopIteration();        

    def _hdf5_next_record(self):
        raise StopIteration();        


    def _raw_retrieve_records(self, mz, delta_ppm, charge, filters, scorers, required_fields):
        self.charge=charge;
        if charge<0:
            self.subf='Negative';
            self.charged=True;
            self.offs=2;
        elif charge>0:
            self.subf='Positive';
            self.charged=True;
            self.offs=2;
        else:
            self.subf='Neutral';
            self.charged=False;
            self.offs=0;
        self.mzmin=mz*(1-1/1000000.0*delta_ppm);
        self.mzmax=mz*(1+1/1000000.0*delta_ppm);
        self.mzmin_int=int(self.mzmin*100);
        self.mzmax_int=int(self.mzmax*100);
        self.mzcurrent=self.mzmin_int;
        self.filters=filters;
        self.scorers=scorers;
        self.required_fields=required_fields;
        #self._next_record=self._raw_next_record;
        if self.currentfile!='':
            if hasattr(self,'datafile'):
                if not self.datafile.closed:
                    self.datafile.close();

            self.currentfile='';
        return DBRecordIterator(self);
        
    def _binary_retrieve_records(self, mz, delta_ppm, charge, filters, scorers, required_fields):
        
        
        
        return DBRecordIterator(self);
        
    def _hdf5_retrieve_records(self, mz, delta_ppm, charge, filters, scorers, required_fields):        
        
        
        
        return DBRecordIterator(self);

        



[docs]class DBRecordIterator:
    def __init__(self,database):
        self.database=database;

    def __iter__(self):
        return self;


[docs]    def next(self):
        return self.database._next_record();
